name: ONE PUNCH BEAT (GDKO Round 6)
description:
A one button rythm game I created in two weeks for the GDKO Round 6 Game Jam, the theme was "create a sound/music focused one button game".

I hope you enjoy playing it and feel free to leave feedback and ratings! :)

SONG CREDITS

All songs were released on Argofox!

G&J - Disconcient

Inova - Enraged
